name: The piJnz Group
overview:
piJnz provides brands and agencies with a simple way to create, publish and manage multiple mobile landing pages.

With the growing popularity of smart phones and their use as devices to search for information online and interact with a brand, there is a growing need for businesses to utilize mobile touch points to engage with their audience where they are, and generate more revenue and customer loyalty.

With piJnz, users can create and publish a mobile-friendly page in just a few minutes using an easy drag-and-drop interface. Pages can contain videos, images, social media links, lead generation forms, maps, tap-to-call buttons and other features to showcase a brand’s message and help inform consumers to take immediate action. Teams can create and manage multiple piJnz mobile landing pages as ideal destinations for scanned QR (Quick Response) codes, mobile ads and in conjunction with text messaging services.
